snippet: A children’s chorus singing “Silent Night” provided “Saturday Night Live” with a quietly powerful opening, while Samuel L. Jackson’s use of some adult language set tongues wagging and fingers typing.
abstract: A children’s chorus singing “Silent Night” provided “Saturday Night Live” with a quietly powerful opening, while Samuel L. Jackson’s use of some adult language set tongues wagging and fingers typing.

headline.main: Naughty and Nice on a Yuletide 'Saturday Night Live'
headline.print_headline: Innocence and Obscenity on ‘Saturday Night Live’
